resources.string: You wake up in a haze, smelling of cheap cranberry vodka. Your phone and wallet are gone. With only foggy memories of the night before you slouch up and look at your surroundings. You see the flickering fluorescent lights, the chipped floor tiles, and remains of dead cockroaches. The hallways seem to stretch on forever and you can\'t see the way out. Horror wells up in you as realize where you are. You know you have to try and escape. \n\n Welcome to Main House
You reached the end of the maze!
